block.name: Not
block.doc: Implements the boolean logic function out = NOT in. Inverts all the bits input stream.

param.name: IO Type
param.doc: Specifies the data type of the input and output.

option.name: Int
option.doc: Sets the input and output to integer (signed, 32-bit) values.

option.name: Short
option.doc: Sets the input and output to short (signed, 16-bit) values.

option.name: Byte
option.doc: Sets the input and output to byte (unsigned, 8-bit) values.
